display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces the attack rate by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. NOTE: This enhancement cannot be slotted into a mastermind pet, or pet that doesn't benefit from recharge enhancements.
